content:
Goal / Output
* I've reformatted "xn+y" and added "or xn-y".

Input
* I've added "<<Lines 1 to 4>>".

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's a simple problem that requires some thought.
Someone gave me another way to resolv the exercice with a string in a strub composed of numbers in C#. So Python is a better language for coc . Sorry for all the bad I said .I retire the rejection
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/2126eca36357ed7629992ddcaf491857d952 is the same thing (except there you also have to determine if it's an arithmetic or geometric sequence)
The formula of the nth term is different from finding the nth term of the sequence so my clash is different from that. Thanks for your opinion anyway.

Hi there, 

I've modified the test case so that the numbers are on separated lines, hope that can help. 

Thanks for your opinions :)
